categories: Category:Events during the New Republic Era

nodes.text: In 21 ABY, Jedi Master Luke Skywalker began investigation upon leads that mentioned the Sith planet Exegol. One of his leads led him and Landonis Balthazar Calrissian on a mission to Pasaana, tracking down an assassin called Ochi due to Skywalker sensing a disturbance in the Force.
